rules: Rule1: Either the job analyst is assigned to the platform lab or the job researcher is assigned to the platform lab.
Rule2: Whenever protocol alpha is completed at facility main, protocol alpha is completed at facility secondary.
Rule3: Given that protocol alpha is completed at facility secondary, protocol beta is completed at facility main.
Rule4: If the job supervisor is assigned to platform management, then drug gamma is cleared at facility main.

Rule5: If the job inspector is assigned to platform audit, then whenever it is not the case that cleared drug gamma at facility main implies operational platform lab, protocol gamma is suspended at facility main.
Rule6: The job inspector is assigned to platform audit or the job auditor is assigned to platform audit.
Rule7: If the job auditor is assigned to platform audit, then the job reviewer is assigned to platform audit.

Rule8: Whenever the job reviewer is assigned to platform audit, then if it is not the case that cleared drug gamma at facility main results in operational platform lab, protocol gamma is suspended at facility main.
Rule9: Provided that the job researcher is assigned to the platform lab, the platform lab is operational.
Rule10: If the job coordinator is assigned to platform operations, then either protocol alpha is completed at facility main or protocol alpha is not completed at facility secondary.

Rule11: When the job technician is assigned to the platform lab, then in the event that it is not the case that the job manager is assigned to platform operations or the job coordinator is assigned to platform operations, protocol delta is halted at facility main.
Rule12: Either the job technician is assigned to the platform lab or the job specialist is assigned to the platform lab.

Rule13: If the job specialist is assigned to the platform lab, then provided that it is false that the job manager is assigned to platform operations or the job coordinator is assigned to platform operations, protocol delta is halted at facility main.
Rule14: Should protocol beta be completed at facility secondary, then protocol alpha is not completed at facility secondary.
Rule15: When the job developer is assigned to platform development, the job engineer is assigned to platform development.

Rule16: Either protocol epsilon is completed at facility main or, if the job engineer is assigned to platform development, then whenever the job lead is assigned to platform development, protocol beta is completed at facility secondary.
Rule17: If the job consultant is assigned to platform advisory, then protocol epsilon is not completed at facility main.
Rule18: The job consultant is assigned to platform advisory or the job advisor is assigned to platform advisory.
Rule19: In the event that the job advisor is assigned to platform advisory, protocol epsilon is not completed at facility main.
Rule20: Provided that drug alpha is tested at facility main, facility main approves drug alpha.
Rule21: When drug alpha is tested at facility secondary, drug alpha is tested at facility main.
Rule22: If facility main approves drug beta, then facility secondary approves drug beta.
Rule23: Either facility main approves drug beta or the platform lab is operational.
Rule24: Should it be false that assigned job analyst to platform lab leads to operational platform lab, then facility secondary approves drug alpha.
Rule25: Provided that it is not true that assigned job analyst to platform lab results in operational platform lab, facility main does not approve drug alpha.

Rule26: If it is not the case that assigned job director to platform oversight implies that approved facility main for drug beta leads to not approved facility secondary for drug beta, then protocol alpha is completed at facility main.
Rule27: In the event that it is false that cleared drug gamma at facility main results in operational platform lab, protocol gamma is not suspended at facility main.
Rule28: If it is not the case that approved facility secondary for drug alpha implies tested drug alpha at facility secondary, then drug alpha is banned at facility main.
Rule29: Provided that it is not true that approved facility secondary for drug alpha leads to tested drug alpha at facility secondary, drug alpha is not banned at facility main.
facts: Fact1: The job director is assigned to platform oversight.
Fact2: The job supervisor is assigned to platform management.
Fact3: The job lead is assigned to platform development.
Fact4: The job developer is assigned to platform development.
Fact5: Protocol beta is not completed at facility main.
Fact6: Protocol alpha is not completed at facility main.
Fact7: The job manager is not assigned to platform operations.
Fact8: Protocol delta is not halted at facility main.
